data.description: JSON string of data to send

schema.description: Output schema after sending data, expecting any JSON structure

anyOf.description: Data received from Make.com, will be the string `Accepted` if successful and no data is returned

response.description: Data received from Make.com, will be the string `Accepted` if successful and no data is returned

success.description: True if the data was sent successfully

description: Automate tasks, sync data across multiple applications, and enhance the capabilities of your chatbot like never before.
name: make
title: Make.com (Deprecated)
